IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: CHRISTIAN COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT CORPORATION IS A SUPPORTING ORGANIZATION OF CHRISTIAN COMMUNITY FOUNDATION OF MEMPHIS AND THE MID-SOUTH, INC.
IRS990.MissionDesc: TO ASSIST CHRISTIAN COMMUNITY FOUNDATION OF MEMPHIS AND THE MID-SOUTH, INC. IN CARRYING OUT ITS CHARITABLE MISSION.
IRS990.Desc: GRANTS MADE TO AND ON BEHALF OF CHRISTIAN COMMUNITY FOUNDATION OF MEMPHIS AND THE MID-SOUTH, INC., A SUPPORTED ORGANIZATION.

SupportedOrganizationName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: CHRISTIAN COMMUNITY FOUNDATION OF MEMPHIS AND THE MID-SOUTH INC

RecipientBusinessName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: CHRISTIAN COMMUNITY FOUNDATION OF MEMPHIS AND THE MID-SOUTH INC

RecipientTable.PurposeOfGrantTxt: SUPPORTED ORGANIZATION CONTRIBUTION TO DONOR ADVISED FUND

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: SINCE ORGANIZATION EXISTS TO HELP SUPPORT CHRISTIAN COMMUNITY FOUNDATION OF MEMPHIS AND THE MID-SOUTH, INC., ALL GRANTS ARE PAID DIRECTLY TO THAT AFFILIATE. CHRISTIAN COMMUNITY FOUNDATION OF MEMPHIS AND THE MID-SOUTH, INC. IS A 501(C)(3) PUBLIC CHARITY. ALL ACCOUNTING RECORDS FOR THIS ENTITY AND ITS SUPPORTED ORGANIZATION ARE KEPT AT THE SAME OFFICE AND BY THE SAME CHIEF FINANCIAL OFFICER.

THE FILING ORGANIZATION'S CEO/PRESIDENT'S COMPENSATION IS ESTABLISHED BY CHRISTIAN COMMUNITY FOUNDATION OF MEMPHIS AND THE MID-SOUTH, INC., WHICH IS A RELATED ORGANIZATION. THE APPLICABLE METHODS USED ARE THUS REPORTED ON THE FORM 990, SCHEDULE J FOR CHRISTIAN COMMUNITY FOUNDATION OF MEMPHIS AND THE MID-SOUTH, INC.
ORGANIZATION USES A THIRD PARTY AUCTION COMPANY TO SELL NON-CASH CONTRIBUTIONS OF CRANES AND EQUIPMENT.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: A COPY OF THE 990 IS REVIEWED BY THE EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE OF THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: OFFICERS AND DIRECTORS MUST ANNUALLY SIGN A STATEMENT WHICH AFFIRMS THEY HAVE RECEIVED A COPY OF THE CONFLICTS OF INTEREST POLICY, HAVE READ AND UNDERSTOOD IT, HAVE AGREED TO COMPLY WITH IT, AND UNDERSTAND THAT THE ORGANIZATION IS CHARITABLE AND IN ORDER TO MAINTAIN ITS FEDERAL TAX EXEMPTION IT MUST ENGAGE PRIMARILY IN ACTIVITIES WHICH ACCOMPLISH ONE OR MORE OF ITS TAX-EXEMPT PURPOSES.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: DOCUMENTS ARE AVAILABLE BY REQUEST AND/OR BY VISITING THE ORGANIZATION'S OFFICE.
PROCESSES HAVE NOT CHANGED FROM PRIOR YEAR. THE EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE OF THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS IS RESPONSIBLE FOR THE OVERSIGHT OF THE AUDIT AND SELECTION OF THE AUDITING FIRM.
